#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main(){int coun2=0;
int n;string str;
cin>>n;
for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
    cin>>str;
int x=0;int coun=0;
while(str[x]!='\0')
{   char k=str[x];
    for(int j=0;j<str.size();){
        if(k==str[j]){
            coun++;
            str.erase(str.begin()+j);}
            else{j++;}
       }coun2+=coun/2+coun%2;coun=0;

    //x++;
}
cout<<coun2<<endl;coun2=0;
}
}
